data_table.description: Menopause, Hormone Replacement and Ovary Removal, Omni 2, cases reviewed through Exam 2

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form the study participant identification number.

variable.name: STOPAGE
variable.description: Age when periods reported stopped for one year or more
variable.comment: 29 - 39 = Range of values 40 - 49 = Range of values. 50 - 58 = Range of values.
variable.value: Used hormones before periods stopped and stop age could not be determined

variable.name: CAUSE
variable.value: Hormone use before reporting periods stopped

variable.name: EST1
variable.value: Question not asked if periods not stopped

variable.name: EST2
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 2

variable.name: SERM1
variable.description: Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulators (SERMs) use at Exam 1
variable.value: Question not asked if periods not stopped

variable.name: SERM2
variable.description: Selective Estrogen Receptor Modulators (SERMs) use at Exam 2
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 2

variable.name: OVREM1
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed at Exam 1
variable.comment: This variable represents number of ovaries removed at each exam only. Sum OVREM 1 and OVREM 2 to get the total number of ovaries removed as of Clinic Exam 2.

variable.name: OVREM2
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed at Exam 2
variable.comment: This variable represents number of ovaries removed at each exam only. Sum OVREM 1 and OVREM 2 to get the total number of ovaries removed as of Clinic Exam 2.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 2
